text: Last Man Standing is a 1995 American action movie directed by Joseph Merhi and starring Jeff Wincott, Jonathan Banks, Jonathan Fuller, Steve Eastin, Robert LaSardo, Michael Greene, Ava Fabian, Corbin Bernsen. It was distributed by PM Entertainment Group. ==Other websites== * * Category:1995 action movies Category:American action movies Category:Heist movies Category:Movies about corruption
title: Last Man Standing (1995 movie)
